title: Reminds me of Lucian's good ol' days

embed.description: Corki offers to help Lucian find his wife if he accepts to do a favor. They both venture deep in to the Shadow Isles - in search of Thresh and face many fami...

body: Please, Rito, bring our Lucian back from the Shadow Isles you left him in...

replies.body:
"the good old days" when you couldn't see a single ranked game without lucian
http://i.imgur.com/NmWb0Lm.gif
I just miss when he was built and played more like a caster, as opposed to being a weird right-clicker.

Oh you mean when he used to not auto you then E backwards to infinity?

The only difference back then is that you died faster.

They took a lot of power out of his abilities to improve his mobility.
Now days, his abilities exist primarily to proc his passive. Which, in turn, exists primarily to get his dash back up.

It's not a bad kit. Especially for being "the mobile ADC". But it changed his play style rather heavily.
I'm crying this is so funny.
Really well done, 10/10 would watch again.
Lucian unchained.. Coming cinemas tomorrow... I paid good ol money to watch this shit {{champion:119}}
So this is where you guys are coming from to my video XD {{champion:79}}
